name: Nespresso Vertuo Pop+ Coffee and Espresso Maker by De'Longhi, Black Matte with Dark Chrome
description:
LIMITED EDITION: Vertuo Pop+ Deluxe LIMITED-EDITION coffee maker brews 5 different sizes from 5-12oz coffees and espressos
WATER CAPACITY: Features a removable 25 fl. oz side-mounted water tank for easy access and refilling
OPERATION: One-touch brewing system with 30-second heat up time and descaling alert
CAPSULE COMPATIBILITY: Works exclusively with Nespresso Vertuo capsules, offering over 40 coffee varieties
RECYCLING: Nespresso capsules are fully recyclable through Nespresso's free program
